thread.section_title: Gratiae USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gratiae USA | gratiae-usa.com
thread.title: Kim Stohr
thread.title_full: Gratiae USA reviewed by Kim Stohr

author: Kim Stohr
title: Kim Stohr
text: My jar of renewing moisturizing cream went bad and so I contacted Gratiae customer service. Chelsie responded quickly and was very helpful. After sending proof of purchase and photos of the defective item to her, she promptly approved and sent a replacement jar. I am very grateful for her help :)
